string.name: Title
string.value: Cash Shop

string.name: Desc
string.value: It's a place where, armed with Cash, you'll be able to purchase accessories, clothes, messenger item, hair salon coupons, coupons for plastic surgery, and other various items.

string.name: Title
string.value: Item Inventory

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that allows the character to see the items it owns.\nThe items are categorized under Equip., Use, Set-Up, and Etc. items.

string.name: Title
string.value: Equipment Window

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows the equipped items, and allowing the character to equip/unequip them.\nOpen the item inventory alongside it to use the equip. items.

string.name: Title
string.value: Ability Window

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows detailed character info and its abilities.\nUse AP to enhance many different kinds of abilities.

string.name: Title
string.value: Skill Window

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows the detailed look of the skillbook owned by the character.\nUse skill points to learn the skills available.

string.name: Title
string.value: Messenger Window

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that lets you chat with buddies within a world.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that lets you change the options or game infos.\nCan change game and system option.\nCan also see quest info, party info, and the community info.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Press the button to choose the character you want to whisper to.\nPress it once more to disable whisper.

string.name: Title
string.value: Register Map

string.name: Desc
string.value: Registers the map the character is at to the teleport list. Can save up to 5 maps.

string.name: Title
string.value: Delete Map

string.name: Desc
string.value: Delete the chosen map from the list.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Teleports to the map of your choice, or to the map where the chosen character is.

string.name: Title
string.value: Name of the Character

string.name: Desc
string.value: Once the name is made, the name can't be changed

string.name: Title
string.value: Job of the Character

string.name: Desc
string.value:
The beginner will be able to choose its job as either a warrior, bowman, magician, or a thief
Warrior - Level 10, STR 35 or over, make the job advancement at Perion
Bowman - Level 10, DEX 25 or over, make the job advancement at Henesys
Magician - Level 8, INT 20 or over, make the job advancement at Ellinia
Thief - Level 10, DEX 25 or over, make the job advancent at Kerning City.

string.name: Title
string.value: Main Guild

string.name: Desc
string.value: The main community of the the communities the account belongs to.

string.name: Title
string.value: Health Point

string.name: Desc
string.value: It's a health stat, and if it reaches 0, the character dies.\nHP decreases if either attacked by an enemy or if a certain skill is used.\nIt can go up to the maximum of 10,000 points.

string.name: Title
string.value: Mana Point

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat needed to use various skills.\nIt can go up to the maximum of 10,000 points.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The amount of experience gained. \nObtained by killing a monster or completing a quest.

string.name: Title
string.value: Strength (STR)

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat needed to use heavy weapons and/or armors.\nIt determines the attacking ability of the warriors.

string.name: Title
string.value: Dexterity (DEX)

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher it is, the higher the accuracy and avoidability.\nIt's most important to the bowman, for it determines their attacking ability.

string.name: Title
string.value: Intelligence (INT)

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher it is, the higher the accuracy for spells. \nIt determines the magical power of the magician.\nThe higher it is, the higher the MP increases on level-up's and AP-related increases.

string.name: Title
string.value: Luck (LUK)

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher it is, the higher the avoidability is. \nIt determines the Thief's attacking ability and hands.\nAlso, the higher it is, the less EXP a character loses by dying.

string.name: Title
string.value: AP(Ability Point)

string.name: Desc
string.value:
It can raise the stats of strength, dexterity, stamina, and luck, along with the amount of HP and MP
If raising strength, dexterity, intelligence, or luck, 1 AP will equal an increase of 1 point
If HP or MP, the increase depends on the condition of the character
5 points are given per every level up.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat the determines the damage of weapon attack.\nFor warriors and magicians, it's strength; bowman is dexterity; and thief is based on strength, dexterity, and luck.\nThe aforementioned ability points, along with the equipped equipment, determines the attack points.

string.name: Title
string.value: Weapon Def.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that determines the ability to defend the weapon attack.\nBased on all equipped armors' weapon def.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that determines the success rate and the attacking ability of spells.\nBased on INT and equipped items' magic power.

string.name: Title
string.value: Magic Def.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat for defending spells.\nBased on magic def. of every armor that's been equipped.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that determines the accuracy of weapon attack. \nThe higher, the more accurate.\nBased on dexterity and the equipment item options.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The stat that enables the character to avoid weapon damage.\nThe higher it is, the better the character avoids weapon damage.\nBased on dexterity, luck, and the equipment item options.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Can be changed through equipment item options or skills.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Determines the jumping ability.\nCan be changed through equipment item options or skills.

string.name: Title
string.value: Buying Equipped Items

string.name: Desc
string.value: Buying the items that are equipped by the character. The existing items are not\nincluded in the purchase.

string.name: Title
string.value: Back to Default

string.name: Desc
string.value: Character being put back into the state of default before walking into the cash shop.

string.name: Title
string.value: Deleting Items

string.name: Desc
string.value: Deleting cash items and saving a percentage of its price as MaplePoints

string.name: Title
string.value: Extending Equip. Inventory

string.name: Desc
string.value: Extending an equip. inventory by 4 slots (1 line)\n4000 NX Cash

string.name: Title
string.value: Extending Use Inventory

string.name: Desc
string.value: Extending a use inventory by 4 slots (1 line)\n4000 NX Cash

string.name: Title
string.value: Extending Set-Up Inventory

string.name: Desc
string.value: Extending a set-up inventory by 4 slots (1 line)\n4000 NX Cash

string.name: Title
string.value: Extending Etc. Inventory

string.name: Desc
string.value: Extending an etc. inventory by 4 slots (1 line)\n4000 NX Cash

string.name: Title
string.value: Recharging Cash

string.name: Desc
string.value: Please visit the website to charge your account.

string.name: Title
string.value: Check Cash

string.name: Desc
string.value: Checking the remaining Cash

string.name: Title
string.value: Using Coupon

string.name: Desc
string.value: Exchanging the item coupon into an item.

string.name: Title
string.value: Remove All

string.name: Desc
string.value: Remove all the items that the character is wearing.
